Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: rm

Arguments.Name: r
Arguments.Description: Recursive. Attempt to remove the file hierarchy rooted in each file argument

Arguments.Name: P
Arguments.Description: Overwrite regular files before deleting them

Arguments.Name: d
Arguments.Description: Attempt to remove directories as well as other types of files

Arguments.Name: f
Arguments.Description: ⚠️ Attempt to remove the files without prompting for confirmation

Arguments.Name: i
Arguments.Description: Request confirmation before attempting to remove each file
